quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: If you tell the truth, you don’t have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: All limitations are self-imposed.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.text: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you’ll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Act without expectation.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Be not afraid of going slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Little by little, one travels far.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle
